question: What is the criteria for becoming an Exchange Assister?
text:
What is the criteria for becoming an Exchange Assister?
          
        
The criteria for becoming a registered Virginia Exchange Assister [
Navigators, Certified Application Counselor Designated Organizations (CDOs)], and Certified Application Counselors (CACs)
are updated and
available to prospective applicants
.  Unlike some other states, VA requires all Exchange Assisters to register with the State Corporation Commission. Virginia's Insurance Marketplace Exchange Assister training is updated and can be requested by emailing
Assisterprograms@scc.virginia.gov
.
